title: Banning Teammates Champions
body:
Can you please make it so when you Pre-Select a champion in ranked, your teamates cannot ban it? I have had sooo many instances where I would like to play a champion (I'm a shaco main, Don't hate) and my teammates ban him, just to troll. then bash me for not wanted to play a different champion. Can you please make it so my teammates are unable to ban a champion if i show that I would like to select that champion? I have had it happen 3 times in a row before. and 2 of those times I knew it was intentional.

Thanks

replies.body: what if, you are at the bottom of selection and you have the metas op champ, just not declare your champs or just pick stupid things you declare, not a big deal
shaco is a champion that fall off has the game go on so a liability for the win and will be banned massively by teammate mainly the lower you are in ranked.

Don't show your intended pick until after ban phase. Problem won't completely go away unless you stop one tricking.

Bans are free game. You do have a moral argument if you are first pick though.

I have more of an issue of my teammates banning my champions because they failed to see that I'm hovering them.
Regardless if someone is hovering the flavor of the month champion and is last pick, that doesn't give anyone else the right to intentionally ban their champion without asking. Guess it's just something only one tricks will understand :/

I will ban a meta hero if my team
A) not 1st pick
B) i look them up no history of hero
C) look them up and see bad stats
D) New hero op, perma ban
E) etc
